description: The Torbay Dazzler Grass Palm (Cordyline australis 'Torbay Dazzler') is a standout plant with its shimmering and sparkly light green foliage. Reaching an impressive height of up to 20 feet, the leaves wrap around in a tightly formed upright habit, with white and yellow flowers providing delicate flamboyance. Moreover, this grass palm can handle a variety of climates and tough conditions, making it perfect for a range of landscaping applications. Additionally, Torbay Dazzler Grass Palm requires minimal maintenance, making it perfect for busy gardeners or those wanting a stunning statement. Overall, this hardy grass palm is an amazing addition to any garden.
